messages.content: cg-prompt-info is a set of three custom nodes in ComfyUI that help retrieve information from previously generated images.
To install cg-prompt-info, navigate to the custom_nodes directory in your ComfyUI installation and run the command: git clone https://github.com/chrisgoringe/cg-prompt-info
What is the purpose of the Load Image With Info node in cg-prompt-info?

The Load Image With Info node in cg-prompt-info loads an image and provides an extra output called 'info' which can be connected to the Extract Info node to retrieve information about the original workflow that generated the image.
What information can be retrieved using the Extract Info node in cg-prompt-info?
The Extract Info node in cg-prompt-info allows you to retrieve input values of nodes from the original workflow that were saved as widgets, as long as they are STRING, INT or FLOAT values.
How can you add more information to be retrieved by cg-prompt-info nodes?

By using the third node in cg-prompt-info, you can add it just before saving the image to include all the output values of every node that has already been executed, making more data available for retrieval.
What types of values are stored by the cg-prompt-info nodes?
The cg-prompt-info nodes store only STRING, INT or FLOAT values. For other types of values, it stores the first 30 characters of their string representation.
How can you update cg-prompt-info to the latest version?
To update cg-prompt-info, navigate to the custom_nodes/cg-prompt-info directory in your ComfyUI installation and run the command: git pull
